OOC: Well, actually, ass kissing does go over well in NBW. I'm not that sur=
prised you came on over to leave your lip imprints everywhere, Cassidy. You=
 are queen of ass kissing. And you couldn't be more incorrect about the peo=
ple here. The people here are complete asswipes who cannot resist putting m=
y, Lurker and former member Hollywood Narrator's posts down. Well, not real=
ly me, because you all thought I was DEAD, eh? Well, if I was, it'd be bett=
er then this. This RPG has fallen from grace, and it ain't gonna get up. I =
used to be able to squeeze some fun out this RPG, but that time is gone. Ev=
er since the restart, this RPG has been resisting the fact that it just nee=
ds to lie down in it's own grave that it's very own members and moderators =
have dug. The restart introduced brand new sparkling fresh rules! Like a 5 =
character limit! And what a crock of shit this was! I was going to leave th=
en, but stayed anyway, because of my wanting to keep this RPG far from deat=
h. I realize now, that it isn't possible. Not when you have shit for brains=
 like Cardhead and Airly here. And Airly, you bitch, in case you did not kn=
ow, you introduced a new misery to my life in my time of being here. I have=
 put up with your shitty English and god awful posts, filled with modes of =
ridiculous attacks and ignoring my attacks. I could not be happier as I bid=
 you all a middle finger, with the exception of Lurker. I will remember thi=
s RPG, for being where I first met him. And before I go, I want to wish Air=
ly a lightening bolt to the skull, and Cassidy, you will soon find that if =
you post, you be put down, and that the only one in this RPG with any sense=
 is Lurker and that you will soon come to regret your ass kissing. Lurker, =
see you in the INCREDIBLY AWESOME DBZSF, MAAAAAAAANNNNN!!!!! And bye to you=
 all.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Hop Along Cassidy 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 07, 2002 2:20 PM
  Subject: N=
ice group... ^.^


  OOC: Hi, everyone. ^_^ I know this is sort of out of t=
he blue, but I just felt the need to compliment NBW RPG. It seems like a ve=
ry nice RPG, if you ask me. Most of the writers are very good, and their po=
sts seem well written. I really do enjoy looking through the posts. Haha, I=
 don't understand a lot of stuff, because I don't know much about Neo Beast=
 Wars, but I do like how this RPG is built. You guys do an excellent job, a=
nd I thought you deserved to hear it from someone who's not really in the R=
PG. ^_^ All of you are quite lucky to have such a great owner who keeps the=
 place in shape and together. But, what's an RPG without the members? ^.~ W=
ell, before I end up writing a speech so long that you guys forget what I'm=
 talking about (hee hee, trust me, I can do it... ^_~) I guess I had better=
 shut up. ^_^ You guys are terrific! Keep up the good work, and support eac=
h other so this RPG will last! I just know you guys! can do it! *cheers* NB=
WRPG! NBWRPG! NBWRPG!...

  With bushels of love,

  *~-Cassidy-~*
